Room.Name: West Gate of the City of Hafnia
Room.ShortDescription: You are outside the West Gate of the elve's mountain City of Hafnia.
Room.LongDescription: To the west you see a waterfall and the Ashton River which flows eastward toward the great city of Oceancrest. That city is located on the coast of the Respitial Sea. This gate is closed at nightfall, and does not open until sunrise. Hafnia is a bright and beautiful city built be the elves.
